name: Extra Skeet Shooting
description:
Extra Skeet Shooting is a 2D arcade game I'm developing in my spare time.

DESCRIPTION (WIP)

Shoot at skeets with the right timing (that is, when they're in one of the gunsights), don't miss them and get the highest score! Don't shoot at flying ducks though, or you'll lose your points.

HOW TO PLAY (WIP)

  • TAP/CLICK on the left or right sides of the game view => shoot toward the corresponding direction

PS - This is a WIP project, many features are still missing.
